pizzaorderingsystemnetbeans

Class Pizza

  • java.lang.Object
    • pizzaorderingsystemnetbeans.Pizza
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ToppedPizza

    public class Pizza
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent a single pizza.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pizza

        public Pizza(int pizzaNum,
             Canvas win,
             double startX,
             double startY,
             int pizzaSize,
             int crustType,
             int sauceType)
        Constructor for pizza.
        Parameters:
        pizzaNum - the number of the current pizza in the order
        win - the window to draw the pizza on
        startX - the top-left x coordinate for the section of screen to draw pizza on
        startY - the top-left y coordinate for the section of screen to draw pizza on
        pizzaSize - the size of the pizza
        crustType - the type of crust the pizza has
        sauceType - the sauce on the Pizza
